Products.Title: Grid
Products.Description: A fast and responsive Blazor Grid component with support for unlimited Master-Detail levels, in-cell Data Editing, and flexible Data Shaping options (Grouping, Sorting, Filtering, and Data Summary Computation).

Products.Title: Charts
Products.Description: An elegant, fast, and lightweight Blazor Charting library with 20+ built-in data presentation options (from Pie Charts to Line and Range Charts).

Products.Title: Scheduler
Products.Description: A feature-rich Scheduling/Event Management UI component designed to display detailed snapshots of events/appointments within your Blazor-powered web application (across a single day, a week, or more).

Products.Title: Data Editors
Products.Description: A comprehensive and high-impact suite of Blazor Data Editor components. Our Blazor Data Editors can be used on a standalone or within container components such as our Blazor Data Grid.

Products.Title: Rich Text Editor
Products.Description: A Microsoft Word-inspired Word Processing component for your next Blazor-powered web app. The DevExpress Rich Text Editor allows you to display, edit, and apply rich formatting to any text document.

Products.Title: Reports
Products.Description: DevExpress Reports for Blazor ships with an intuitive Visual Studio Report Designer and a comprehensive suite of report elements including Tables, Labels, Objects, Charts, Pivot Tables, and so much more.

Products.Title: Reports
Products.Description: DevExpress Reports for Blazor ships with an intuitive Visual Studio Report Designer and a comprehensive suite of report elements including Tables, Labels, Objects, Charts, Pivot Tables, and so much more.

Products.Title: Navigation
Products.Description: The DevExpress Navigation Suite includes a comprehensive suite of UI components designed to improve data presentation options, enhance overall usability, and extend app navigation choices within any Blazor-powered web app.

Products.Title: Layout
Products.Description: A unique suite of adaptive page Layout components designed to simplify app design and help enhance the overall usability of your Blazor-powered web app.

Products.Title: Dialogs and Windows
Products.Description: Leverage the power of DevExpress Dialogs and Windows UI components and easily display data and forms within either modal or non-modal dialog windows.

Products.Title: Pivot Grid
Products.Description: Our Excel-inspired Pivot Grid UI control is blazing fast and allows you to quickly incorporate multi-dimensional data analysis and cross-tab reporting within your next Blazor-powered web app.

Products.Title: File Management
Products.Description: Our Blazor file management-related components allow you to upload files within your Blazor project at runtime.

Products.Title: Utility Controls
Products.Description: DevExpress ships a series of high-impact Blazor Utility controls within its Blazor distribution. Leverage the power of these UI controls to extend the capabilities of your next Blazor-powered web app.

RootPages.Title: Overview
RootPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, overview, getting started, devexpress, demo
RootPages.Description: DevExpress UI for Blazor ships with native user interface components (including a Data Grid, Pivot Grid, Charts and Scheduler) so you can design rich user experiences with both Blazor.
RootPages.OG_Title: Native Blazor Components powered by DevExpress
RootPages.OG_Description: DevExpress UI for Blazor ships with native user interface components (including a Data Grid, Pivot Grid, Charts and Scheduler) so you can design rich user experiences with both Blazor.

RootPages.Title: Data Grid
RootPages.MaintenanceModeMessage: The Data Grid was moved to maintenance support mode. No new features/capabilities will be added to this component. We recommend that you [migrate](https://docs.devexpress.com/Blazor/403162/grid/migrate-from-data-grid-to-grid) to the [Grid](Grid) component.

Pages.Title: Overview
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, data, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: A fast and responsive grid component with unlimited master-detail levels and unmatched data shaping capabilities.

Pages.Title: Data Binding
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, data bind, data binding, bind to data, asynchronous data binding, bind to data asynchronously, async support, custom data source, custom data binding, web api support, bind to web api, remote data source, large data source, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor supports synchronous and asynchronous data binding to various data sources (including custom and large data sources).

Pages.Title: Column Types
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, column type, columns, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports column objects that display and edit different data types: text, numbers, dates, and Boolean values.

Pages.Title: Sort Data
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, grid sort, grid sorting, datagrid sort, datagrid sorting, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports sorting data against multiple columns. A column's current sort order is indicated by a sort glyph displayed in the column header.

Pages.Title: Group Data
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, grouping, groups, drag-and-drop, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor component enables you to drag-and-drop grid headers or use grouping API to group data against multiple data columns.

Pages.Title: Edit Data
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, data editing, edit data, edit form, popup edit form, add rows, add new row, insert row, remove rows, delete rows, edit row values, edit modes, edit options, command column, cascade editors, cascading combobox, cascade logic, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid allows users to edit data in the edit form or in the popup edit form.

Pages.Title: Validate Input
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, template, form validation, form template, form template validation, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid allows you to implement a custom edit form with built-in data validation.

Pages.Title: Filter Row

Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports the Filter Row that allows users to filter data.

Pages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor supports total and group summaries.

Pages.Title: Selection

Pages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor component supports Single Row, Multiple Rows, and Multiple Rows with Optimized Performance selection modes.

Pages.Title: Paging and Scrolling
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, scrolling, vertical scrolling, horizontal scrolling, virtual scrolling, load records on demand, paging, pager, pages, go to page, page size selection, custom page size, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports horizontal scrolling, vertical scrolling, and virtual scrolling (loading data on demand). The Data Grid displays a pager that enables data navigation.

Pages.Title: Master-Detail View
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, master grid, detail grid, master-detail relationship, master-detail view, detail row, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor component allows you to build master-detail layouts and relationships of any complexity and depth with a detail row template.

Pages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Data Grid allows users to resize columns in two modes: change the width of the column to the right or the width of the entire grid.

Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid can display a Column Chooser in a toolbar. The Column Chooser is a separate window that allows users to show, hide, and reorder Data Grid columns at runtime.

Pages.Title: Calendar
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxCalendar, calendar, date, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Calendar allows users to select dates and navigate through months and years. The component supports multiple date selection and cell customization.

Pages.Title: Masked Input
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxMaskedInput, masked input, maskedinput, null text, prompt text, mask, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Masked Input is a text editor that supports text, numeric, date-time, and regular expression masks.

Pages.Title: Memo
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxMemo, memo, text area, multi-line text box, text in multiple lines, text in multiple rows, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Memo is a multi-line text area that allows users to type and edit text in multiple rows.

Pages.Title: Radio
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxRadio, DxRadioGroup, radio, radiogroup, radiobutton, radio options, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Radio component allows you to create options and combine them to groups. A user can select only one option in a group at a time.

Pages.Title: Radio Group
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxRadioGroup, radiogroup, radiobutton, radio options, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor RadioGroup component allows you to create a group of options. A user can select only one option in the group at a time.

Pages.Title: Spin Edit
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxSpinEdit, spinedit, spin edit, number editor, null text, prompt text, devexpress, demo, sample, example, mask, numeric mask
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Spin Edit allows the user to modify numeric data by typing a new value into the text box or by using the up/down spin buttons to increment/decrement the value.

Pages.Title: TagBox
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxTagBox, tag box, tagbox, tags, custom tags, data binding, databinding, data source, virtual scrolling, scrolling, filtering, incremental filtering, starts with filtering, contains filtering, null text, nulltext, templates, validation, read-only tagbox, multiple tag selection, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor TagBox allows users to select multiple tags from a drop-down list or type custom tags. TagBox supports incremental filtering, virtual scrolling, validation, and templates.

Pages.Title: Text Box
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxTextBox, text box, textbox, memo, null text, prompt text, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Text Box is a single-line editor that enables a user to enter and edit text. The component also supports binding to a data source and password mode.

Pages.Title: Time Edit
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxTimeEdit, time edit, timeedit, time, null text, prompt text, devexpress, demo, sample, example, mask, time mask
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Time Edit is a time editor with a drop-down time picker. A user can enter the time into the text box or pick it in the drop-down window.

Pages.Title: DropDown
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxDropDown, popup, window, dialog, popup dialog, popup window, modal popup, modal dialog, modal window, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor DropDown is a pop-up window that overlays the current view. The component consists of a customizable header, pop-up body, and footer.

Pages.Title: Flyout
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxFlyout, popup, window, dialog, popup dialog, popup window, modal popup, modal dialog, modal window, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Flyout is a pop-up window that overlays the current view. The component consists of a customizable header, pop-up body, and footer.

Pages.Title: Popup
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxPopup, popup, window, dialog, popup dialog, popup window, modal popup, modal dialog, modal window, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Popup is a pop-up window that overlays the current view. The component consists of a customizable header, pop-up body, and footer.

PageSections.Title: Response to Show and Close Actions

Pages.Title: Window
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxWindow, popup, window, dialog, popup dialog, popup window, resizing, dragging, resizable popup, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Window is an resizable and draggable dialog window that provides additional optional context to the current view and does not block a user's interaction with the rest of page. The component consists of a customizable header, pop-up body, and footer.

Pages.Title: Upload
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxUpload, upload, upload control, file upload, file upload control, upload files, blazor upload, chunk upload, large files upload, large files, delayed upload, delay file upload, multi-file selection, drag and drop, external drop zone, validation, limit uploaded file size, validate uploaded file extension, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Upload allows users to upload files to the server. It supports drag and drop, chunk upload for large files, multi-file selection, and validation.

Pages.Title: Form Layout
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxFormLayout, form, form editor, form layout, formlayout, devexpress, demo, sample, example, collapsible groups, expand groups
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Form Layout allows you to construct responsive and automatically-aligned edit forms. Form Layout can group items, and display UI elements in tabs. You can also bind the component to a data source.

Pages.Title: Grid Layout
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxGridLayout, page layout, grid layout, layout, layout breakpoints, breakpoint, adaptive UI, adaptivity, adaptive layout, responsive layout, responsive UI, arrange UI elements, layout items, rows, columns, areas, template areas, layout areas, grid areas, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Grid Layout component allows you to arrange UI elements on a page. The component is based on a CSS Grid Layout: layout items are organized into rows and columns. DxLayoutBreakpoint allows you to adapt a page layout to different screen sizes. For example, you can use breakpoints to create responsive DxGridLayout, DxStackLayout, or other components.

Pages.Title: Layout Breakpoint
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, LayoutBreakpoint, page layout, adaptive grid, responsive grid, cardview, card view, implement cardview, grid layout, layout, layout breakpoints, breakpoint, adaptive UI, adaptivity, adaptive layout, responsive layout, responsive UI, arrange UI elements, layout items, rows, columns, areas, template areas, layout areas, grid areas, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: Layout breakpoint description

Pages.Title: Stack Layout
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxStackLayout, page layout, stack layout, layout, arrange UI elements, layout items, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Stack Layout component allows you to stack UI elements vertically or horizontally.

Pages.Title: Tabs
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxTabs, tab, tabs, tabcontrol, tab control, pagecontrol, page control, page component, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Tabs allows you to implement tabbed layout and control an active tab from code. You can also use this component to emulate a Page control in your Blazor application.

Pages.Title: Overview
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, menu, treeview, pager, popup, dropdown, layout, toolbar, tabs, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: A suite of navigation components including TreeView and Pager, in conjunction with layout components that are designed to make your UI adaptive.

Pages.Title: Accordion
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxAccordion, accordion, panel bar, nav bar, expansion, collapsible groups, navigation, demo, sample, example, devexpress
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Accordion for Blazor allows you to display collapsible panels and organize information on pages with space constraints.

Pages.Title: Context Menu
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxContextMenu, menu, context menu, contextmenu, popup menu,  devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Context Menu allows you to add a context menu to your Blazor application. You can populate the Context Menu items manually or bound the component to a hierarchical data structure.

Pages.Title: Menu
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxMenu, menu, drop-down menu, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Menu allows you to add an adaptive menu to your Blazor application. You can populate the Menu items collection, specify the component's orientation, adaptivity settings, display modes, and item templates.

Pages.Title: Toolbar
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxToolbar, toolbar, toolbar component, button, adaptivity, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Toolbar allows you to implement an adaptive button-based interface in your web application. The component supports drop-down, checked, and radio buttons and allows you to define item templates.

Pages.Title: TreeView
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxTreeView, treeview, tree view, tree component, navigation, tree navigation, selection, node selection, node checking, recursive checking, multiple checking, check nodes, hierarchical data binding, hierarchical databinding, binding to hierarchical data, hierarchical data source, hierarchy, nodes, display master-detail data, display master-detail object, display master-detail objects, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor TreeView displays hierarchical data structures within a tree-like UI. The component supports data binding and master-detail relationships.

PageSections.Title: Load Child Nodes on Demand Mode

Pages.Title: Overview
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxPivotGrid, pivot grid, pivot table, sorting, grouping, sub-totals, grand-totals, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pivot Grid summarizes data from the underlying data source and presents the results in cross-tabulated format.

Pages.Title: Large Data Source
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxPivotGrid, pivot grid, pivot table, data binding, entity framework bind, paging, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pivot Grid delivers high performance when the component is bound to a large data source.

Pages.Title: Chart Integration
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxPivotGrid, pivot grid, pivot table, chart, pivot grid and chart integration, data visualization, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Pivot Grid for Blazor can be easily integrated with DevExpress Charts for Blazor. This allows you to visualize grid's data on a chart.

Pages.Title: Templates
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxPivotGrid, pivot grid, pivot table, customization, cell templates, formatting, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pivot Grid allows you to use native Razor markup to define custom templates for grid fields.

RootPages.Title: Reports
RootPages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxReportViewer, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer, devexpress, demo, example
RootPages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Report Viewer is a native Blazor control that allows users to preview, print, and export reports to various formats.

Pages.Title: Report Designer (JavaScript based)
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxReportViewer, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report designer, reportdesigner, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer, devexpress, demo, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Report Designer is a JavaScript control integrated in Blazor framework that allows users to create and edit reports. Its preview functionality can be used to preview, print, and export reports.

RootPages.Title: Reports
RootPages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxReportViewer, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer, devexpress, demo, example
RootPages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Report Viewer is a native Blazor control that allows users to preview, print, and export reports to various formats.

Pages.Title: Report Designer (JavaScript based)
Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxReportViewer, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report designer, reportdesigner, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer, devexpress, demo, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Report Designer is a JavaScript control integrated in Blazor framework that allows users to create and edit reports. Its preview functionality can be used to preview, print, and export reports.

Pages.Title: Overview
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, component, DxRichEdit, text editor, docx, txt, rtf, rich format
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Rich Text Editor allows users you to create, open, modify, print, save, and convert rich-formatted text files.

Pages.Title: Document API
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, component, DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, modify document, programmatically, in code
Pages.Description: With our Blazor Rich Text Editor, you can modify the open document programmatically.

Pages.Title: Simple View
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, component, DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, simple view, web layout
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Rich Text Editor for Blazor can display a document in Simple View mode (Web Layout).

Pages.Title: Ribbon Customization
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, component, DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, customization, appearance customization, ribbon
Pages.Description: The Blazor Rich Text Editor allows you to display a custom ribbon in your applications.

Pages.Title: Toolbar Customization
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, component, DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, customization, appearance customization, toolbar
Pages.Description: The Blazor Rich Text Editor allows you to display a built-in or custom toolbar.

Pages.Title: Mail Merge
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, component, DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, mail merge
Pages.Description: Mail merge feature allows you to bind the control to an external data source, preview dynamic content in the opened document template, and generate the resulting document with merged data.

Pages.Title: Spell Check
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, component, DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, spell check
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Rich Text Editor ships with a built-in spell check service that can detect spelling errors and suggest corrections.

Pages.Title: Overview
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxScheduler, scheduler, day view, work week view, week view, appointment, resource, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: A fully-featured scheduling solution that easily displays a detailed snapshot of events/appointments in your web application across a single day or a week.

Pages.Title: View Types
Pages.Description: The Scheduler UI for Blazor can display regular and recurrent appointments in a Day, Work Week or Week View. The Scheduler also allows users to create, remove, and manage appointments.

Pages.Keywords: Blazor, components, DxScheduler, scheduler, recurring appointments, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: The Scheduler UI for Blazor can display regular and recurrent appointments in a Day, Work Week or Week View. The Scheduler also allows users to create, remove, and manage appointments.

Pages.Description: The DevExpress Scheduler for Blazor allows you to assign resources to appointments. You can also use this feature to group appointments by resource or by date.

Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Button supports various render styles and can display icons. Button supports the disable state, form submission, templates, and HTML attributes.

Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, loading panel, loading indicator, progress indication, DxLoadingPanel, demo, example, sample, devexpress
Pages.Description: The Blazor Loading Panel displays progress indication.

Pages.Keywords: blazor, components, DxPager, pager, pages, pager component, pages component, go to page, devexpress, demo, sample, example
Pages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pager enables data navigation and helps visualize a current position within a bound data source. The component allows you to set up the total number of pages and the number of visible page numbers.

Pages.Description: The Blazor Wait Indicator displays progress of time-consuming operations. You can embed the Wait Indicator into other UI controls.
